name: No cube left behind
description:
No cube left behind

This game is about finding a way through the level when per round less parts of the level are there. The pieces become players which get under your control so you have to manage more and more players and think about new ways to get to the end.

To move the selected layer press A and D, and the spacebar to jump. At the point of the game where more than one player are under your control, you change between them pressing tab.
Rotating blocks can be turned around 90° when you press E (you will recognize those by their bluish color).

Frustrated?
In the bottom left corner is a "Skip Level" button to still explore the other game mechanics!

Disclaimer:
If you play in browser, the visuals are not going to be really good, and the skip level buttons do not work!

Coding: Moritz
SFX: Willi
Leveldesign: Jan, Matilde
Visuals: Moritz

This game was made for the 3rd Blackthornprod GameJam.

(Intro Music: Bensound.com Evolution)
All other audio made by our selfes!
